title: BRIEF-Facebook To Test New Monetization Tools For Creators
text: March 19, 2018 / 4:23 PM / Updated 24 minutes ago BRIEF-Facebook To Test New Monetization Tools For Creators Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 19 (Reuters) - Facebook Inc: * FACEBOOK SAYS WILL BE TESTING RANGE OF NEW TOOLS FOR CREATORS, STARTING A NEW TEST THAT HIGHLIGHTS A CREATORâ€™S TOP FANS * FACEBOOK SAYS TESTING A CONTENT RIGHTS MANAGEMENT TOOL DESIGNED FOR CREATORS * FACEBOOK SAYS IN THE COMING MONTHS, GOING TO EXPLORE TWO NEW MONETIZATION FEATURES FOR CREATORS * FACEBOOK SAYS MONETIZATION FEATURES FOR CREATORS INCLUDE ONE THAT HELPS ADVERTISERS AND CREATORS CONNECT FOR BRANDED CONTENT OPPORTUNITIES * FACEBOOK SAYS WILL BE TESTING A WAY FOR FANS TO BECOME A SUPPORTER OF CREATORS AS PART OF THE MONETIZATION TOOLS FOR CREATORS Source text : ( bit.ly/2IDbVPF ) Further company coverage:
